post.summary: Get rewards API- accrual and r
post.description: This API would calculate the rewards for accrual and redemption engine. It would check for the rule conditions satisfied and will get rewards as pe conflict resolution setup in Backend.
this API will give all the coupons which are applicable to the user. IM number would need to be passed for getting all the applicable coupons to the user
This API is called when user applies the coupon on the front end. Once applied, the status of the coupon shall change to assign on the admin panel
This API is used to validate the coupon applied by the user. Coupon is validated if the user satisfies certain conditions.

get.description: Confirm coupon API is called when user consumes the coupon on front end application. Once confirmed, coupon cannot be unblocked

parameters.name: coupon_code_id
parameters.description: coupon code id of the coupon

get.description: unblock coupon unblocks an assigned coupon after 30 minutes of no confirmation. once unblocked, coupon code can be used again

parameters.name: coupon_code_id
parameters.description: Unique Coupon code id of the coupon

post.description: Tier benefit tag API is specifically used for Tier benefit coupons which are tagged to IM users via a tag API.

By calling this API, the system would return all the coupons which are applicable for a particular user. If no IM number is passed, it would return all the Generic coupons which are not tagged to any IM number
This will be called after the complete transaction of a booking. This transaction details will be saved Solr.

get.description: This API returns the campaigns of raffle events. The request can be for all campaigns or active campaigns.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type can be all or active

code.name: code
code.description: response code for success or failure

limit_per_user.name: limit_per_user
limit_per_user.description: limit of tickets a customer can purchase for the campaign

marketing_text.name: marketing_text
marketing_text.description: Marketing text to be shown on front end

terms_and_conditions.name: terms_and_conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: Terms and conditions to participate and win

no_of_winners.name: no_of_winners
no_of_winners.description: Number of winners for the campaign

get.description: This API would return the status of the raffle campaign. Status can be active, inactive, winner pending or winner declared.

parameters.name: campaign_code
parameters.description: campaign code of the campaign for which status need to be fetched

values.name: Iphone 5 campaign
values.marketing_text: Redeem miles and participate to win an iphone
values.terms_and_conditions:
Get a chance to win Iphone 5. T&C: 

  1. User shall be a registered IM number.
  2. User shall not have won any of Raffles event in past one year

post.description: This API would be called when a customer purchases a ticket for a raffle campaign.

code.name: code
code.description: response code for success or failure

order_id.name: order_id
order_id.description: order id of purchasing the ticket

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: Number of tickets purchased by the user

raffle_codes.name: raffle_codes
raffle_codes.description: raffle codes generated for the user

post.description: This API would be called when winners of a campaign are to be picked by API. Winners can be picked only when pick winner by API checkbox is enabled.
This API would be called when some winners of a particular campaign. New winners would replace the disqualified winners.

value.message: Customers disqualified successfully, Below is the new winner list

get.description: This API would be called to get the list of winners for a parituclar campaign. To get the list of winners, raffle status must be Winners Declared.

parameters.name: campaign_code
parameters.description: Campaign code of the campaign for which winners need to be fetched.

get.description: This API would be called to check the list of campaigns in which a customer has participated. The raffle codes would also be returned in the response.

parameters.name: im_number
parameters.description: IM number of the user for which list of raffle campaigns need to fetched

values.name: Intermiles campaign
values.marketing_text: Redeem 100 miles and stand a chance to win 10000 miles

post.description: This API consists of the Send Grid transaction email API. This is the temporary integration in the Bespoke application. Later on it (Clever tap) will have its own individual server for hosting the apis

get.description: This api is used for clever tap sms integration. Currently hosted on Bespoke but later on will be hosted on a separate server

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: This is Test SMS >> and visit us on [SHORTENURL]

get.description: This APIwould check the essential services / resources and get the response as success or failed depending on the services's health check

This API get all the details belonging to a specific order ID. The records are grouped on the basis of IM number. If by any chance for 2 different customers the order IDs are same, then 2 records will be given in the output denoting the 2 different IM numbers.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The order id for which the records are to be fetched

value.message: subject: vernost,successful transfer money to your account
